description: Stop an already running Bot Recommendation request.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot containing the bot recommendation to be stopped.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot containing the bot recommendation.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the bot recommendation to stop. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

parameters.name: botRecommendationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot recommendation to be stopped.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot containing the bot recommendation that is being stopped.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot containing the recommendation that is being stopped.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the bot response to stop. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the bot recommendation. If the status is Failed, then the reasons for the failure are listed in the failureReasons field.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot recommendation that is being stopped.
